thread.title: Quiz: Which type of Halloween candy are you?
thread.title_full: Quiz: Which type of Halloween candy are you? | OregonLive.com

author: Grant Butler | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Quiz: Which type of Halloween candy are you?
text:
Halloween is less than three weeks away, which means grocery and drug stores are loaded up with bags of miniature candy bars and other goodies for trick-or-treaters.
Which Halloween candy you pick out offers a bit of a window into who you are.
Having an affinity for Snickers bars might be reflect of a crunchy persona. Loving Reese's Peanut Butter Cups may be a sign that you're an old softy. And digging M&Ms may reveal someone who projects a hard exterior, but is really sweet inside.
Take our quiz and figure out which Halloween candy best represents who you are.
-- Grant Butler gbutler@oregonian.com
503-221-8566; @grantbutler
